title: The 4 AAAAs of the AI ECOSYSTEM: Assistants, APIs, Agents, and Augmented Reality

rawLines.text: all right In this video I'm going to
talk about the AI ecosystem that I think
everyone is actually building and moving
towards without even realizing that
they're doing so And I'm going to break

reality And I think once you see this

all moving in this directions toward
